name: Bread On Wheels
description:
Description

Control a toast that runs away on a skateboard. You will have to dodge different obstacles that you find on the way and birds that will try to eat you.

Perform tricks on the skateboard by collecting the cherries you find along the way to score more points and try to go as far as possible!

Remember that you can also customize your toast from the main menu.

Controls
  • Space for jump and execute tricks
  • S key to down
  • Escape for pause or exit
